### Options

```{r}
selectizeInput("plotQ", "Plot Questionnaire", choices = questionnaireList, selected = questionnaireList[1], multiple = FALSE)
selectizeInput("qCategory", "Category", choices = categories, selected = categories[1], multiple = TRUE)
selectizeInput("qColor", "Color", choices = categories, selected = categories[1], multiple = FALSE)
```
